item.title: UVa OJ 1152 - 4 Values whose Sum is 0
item.description: Problem 给定4个n（1≤n≤4000）元素集合A, B, C, D，要求分别从中选取一个元素a, b, c, d，使得 a+b+c+d=0。问：有多少种选法？ Input The input begins with a single positive integer on a line by itself indicating the number of the cases following, each of them as described below. This line is followed by a blank line, and there is also a blank line between two consecutive inputs. The first line of the input file contains the size of the lists n (this value can be as large as 4000).
